plainFields.name: max_package_height_cm
plainFields.description: Maximum package height in centimeters.

plainFields.name: estimated_delivery_days_standard
plainFields.description: Standard estimated delivery time in business days for standard shipping service.

plainFields.name: estimated_delivery_days_express
plainFields.description: Estimated delivery time in business days for express shipping service. Null if carrier doesn't offer express.

plainFields.name: estimated_delivery_days_overnight
plainFields.description: Estimated delivery time in business days for overnight shipping. Null if not offered.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when carrier record was created/integrated into system.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last update to carrier configuration or integration details.

models.name: shopping_mall_return_requests
models.description: Main return request entity representing customer requests to return purchased items. Captures the complete return workflow from initial request through completion. Links to orders and customers, and tracks return lifecycle including approval status, reason for return, and resolution. Central entity for managing post-fulfillment reverse transactions.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_order_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the original order being returned. Links to {@link shopping_mall_orders.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Customer who initiated the return request. Links to {@link shopping_mall_customer.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_return_reason_id
foreignFields.description: Predefined return reason selected by customer. Links to {@link shopping_mall_return_reasons.id}.

plainFields.name: return_number
plainFields.description: Unique human-readable return request number in format RET-YYYYMMDD-XXXXXX for customer reference and tracking.

plainFields.name: return_status
plainFields.description: Current status of return request: PENDING (awaiting approval), APPROVED (approved by seller/admin), RECEIVED (items received), INSPECTED (inspection completed), COMPLETED (return processed), CANCELLED, REJECTED (by seller).

plainFields.name: customer_description
plainFields.description: Detailed description provided by customer explaining reason for return, up to 2000 characters.

plainFields.name: return_window_days
plainFields.description: Number of days allowed for customer to initiate return from delivery date, typically 30 days.

plainFields.name: return_authorization_number
plainFields.description: Unique Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number generated when return is approved, used for shipment tracking.

plainFields.name: approved_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when return request was approved by seller or admin.

plainFields.name: received_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when returned items were received at return destination.

plainFields.name: inspection_completed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when inspection of returned items was completed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when return request was initially created by customer.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of most recent modification to return request.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for logical deletion while preserving data integrity.

models.name: shopping_mall_return_items
models.description: Individual items included in a return request. Represents specific products being returned from an order. Each return item links to the original order item and captures item-level return information including condition and quantity being returned. Always managed through parent return request.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_return_request_id
foreignFields.description: Parent return request containing this item. Links to {@link shopping_mall_return_requests.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_order_item_id
foreignFields.description: Original order item being returned. Links to {@link shopping_mall_order_items.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_product_id
foreignFields.description: Product being returned. Links to {@link shopping_mall_products.id}.

plainFields.name: quantity_returned
plainFields.description: Number of units being returned from original order quantity.

plainFields.name: item_condition
plainFields.description: Condition of returned item: UNOPENED (original packaging intact), USED (shows wear but functional), DAMAGED (defective or damaged), OTHER.

plainFields.name: refund_eligible
plainFields.description: Whether this item is eligible for refund based on condition and return policy.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when return item was added to return request.

models.name: shopping_mall_return_inspections
models.description: Inspection records for quality assurance of returned items. Captures detailed inspection findings when returned items are received and examined. Determines whether items meet return conditions and refund eligibility. Can be searched and managed independently by inspection staff.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_return_item_id
foreignFields.description: The return item being inspected. Links to {@link shopping_mall_return_items.id}.

plainFields.name: inspection_status
plainFields.description: Current inspection status: PENDING (awaiting inspection), IN_PROGRESS (inspection underway), APPROVED (item meets conditions), REJECTED (item does not meet conditions).

plainFields.name: inspection_notes
plainFields.description: Detailed inspection notes documenting condition of item, damage assessment, and findings, up to 2000 characters.

plainFields.name: defect_found
plainFields.description: Whether inspection identified defect or damage caused by manufacturer/shipping rather than customer use.

plainFields.name: customer_damage
plainFields.description: Whether inspection identified damage caused by customer misuse or improper handling.

plainFields.name: restocking_fee_applicable
plainFields.description: Percentage restocking fee to be deducted from refund (0-25% depending on condition), if applicable.

plainFields.name: approved_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when inspection was completed and approved.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when inspection record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of most recent inspection update.

models.name: shopping_mall_refund_requests
models.description: Refund request management entity tracking customer requests for financial reimbursement. Represents monetary refund workflows separate from physical return tracking. Links to return requests and orders, tracks refund amounts, methods, and processing status. Requires independent management and API operations.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_return_request_id
foreignFields.description: Associated return request if this refund is for returned items. Links to {@link shopping_mall_return_requests.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_order_id
foreignFields.description: Original order being refunded. Links to {@link shopping_mall_orders.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Customer requesting the refund. Links to {@link shopping_mall_customer.id}.

plainFields.name: refund_number
plainFields.description: Unique human-readable refund request number in format REF-YYYYMMDD-XXXXXX for tracking.

plainFields.name: refund_status
plainFields.description: Current refund status: PENDING (awaiting approval), APPROVED (approved for processing), PROCESSING (refund being processed), COMPLETED (refund issued), FAILED (processing failed), CANCELLED.

plainFields.name: refund_reason
plainFields.description: Customer-provided reason for refund request, up to 1000 characters.

plainFields.name: refund_amount
plainFields.description: Total refund amount in customer's currency after deductions (restocking fees, return shipping, etc.).

plainFields.name: original_amount
plainFields.description: Original order amount before any refund deductions.

plainFields.name: deductions_amount
plainFields.description: Total amount deducted from refund (restocking fees, return shipping fees, etc.).

plainFields.name: refund_method
plainFields.description: Method of refund: ORIGINAL_PAYMENT (back to original payment method), STORE_CREDIT (credit in customer account), OTHER.

plainFields.name: approved_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when refund request was approved by seller or admin.

plainFields.name: processing_started_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when refund processing began.

plainFields.name: completed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when refund was successfully processed and issued to customer.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when refund request was initially created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of most recent modification to refund request.

models.name: shopping_mall_refund_processing
models.description: Refund processing workflow entity tracking stages in the refund processing pipeline. Represents individual processing steps and actions taken during refund execution. Links to refund requests and tracks payment processing details, approval chain, and processing status at each step.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_refund_request_id
foreignFields.description: The refund request being processed. Links to {@link shopping_mall_refund_requests.id}.

plainFields.name: processing_step
plainFields.description: Current processing step: VALIDATION (validating refund eligibility), APPROVAL (awaiting approval), PAYMENT_PROCESSING (submitting to payment gateway), PAYMENT_CONFIRMED (payment processed), COMPLETED (refund issued).

plainFields.name: processing_status
plainFields.description: Status of current step: PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, SUCCESSFUL, FAILED.

plainFields.name: payment_transaction_id
plainFields.description: Transaction ID from payment gateway when refund is submitted for processing.

plainFields.name: payment_confirmation_code
plainFields.description: Confirmation code from payment gateway when refund is successfully processed.

plainFields.name: processing_notes
plainFields.description: Notes about processing step, issues encountered, or actions taken, up to 1000 characters.

plainFields.name: retry_count
plainFields.description: Number of times this processing step has been retried if failures occurred.

plainFields.name: next_retry_at
plainFields.description: Scheduled time for next retry attempt if processing step failed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when processing step was initiated.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of most recent processing update.

models.name: shopping_mall_refund_history
models.description: Historical audit trail of all refund transactions and state changes. Append-only snapshot records capturing complete refund processing history for compliance and audit purposes. Read-only from user perspective with immutable records for financial compliance and dispute resolution.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_refund_request_id
foreignFields.description: The refund request this history entry is for. Links to {@link shopping_mall_refund_requests.id}.

plainFields.name: event_type
plainFields.description: Type of history event: CREATED (refund request created), APPROVED (refund approved), PROCESSING_STARTED (processing began), PAYMENT_SUBMITTED (payment sent to gateway), PAYMENT_COMPLETED (payment successful), FAILED (processing failed), CANCELLED, COMPLETED.

plainFields.name: previous_status
plainFields.description: Previous refund status before this event occurred.

plainFields.name: new_status
plainFields.description: New refund status after this event.

plainFields.name: refund_amount
plainFields.description: Refund amount at time of this historical event.

plainFields.name: event_details
plainFields.description: Detailed information about event (approver, system action, error message, etc.), up to 2000 characters.

plainFields.name: created_by
plainFields.description: Who or what caused this event (admin username, system process, customer, automated job, etc.).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this history event was recorded (immutable).

models.name: shopping_mall_return_reasons
models.description: Reference table containing predefined return reasons that customers can select when initiating return requests. Static lookup table managed by system administration for standardized return reason categorization. Used for analytics and process improvement.

plainFields.name: reason_code
plainFields.description: Unique code for this return reason (e.g., DEFECTIVE, WRONG_ITEM, NOT_DESCRIBED, DAMAGED_SHIPPING, CHANGED_MIND).

plainFields.name: reason_label
plainFields.description: Customer-facing display label for this return reason, up to 100 characters.

plainFields.name: reason_description
plainFields.description: Detailed description explaining this return reason to customers, up to 500 characters.

plainFields.name: requires_inspection
plainFields.description: Whether items returned for this reason require formal inspection before refund approval.

plainFields.name: refund_eligibility
plainFields.description: Refund eligibility for this reason: FULL (full refund), PARTIAL (may incur fees), STORE_CREDIT_ONLY, CASE_BY_CASE.

plainFields.name: sort_order
plainFields.description: Display order in customer-facing return reason dropdown (0 = first).

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Whether this reason is currently available for customer selection.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this return reason was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of most recent update to this return reason.

models.name: shopping_mall_reviews
models.description: Core product review records capturing customer feedback after delivery. Stores verified purchase reviews with content, ratings, and moderation status. Each review represents one customer's experience with one product from one order, enabling comprehensive feedback management and social proof for the platform.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_order_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the customer's order for purchase verification. {@link shopping_mall_orders.id}

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_product_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the product being reviewed for aggregation and analytics. {@link shopping_mall_products.id}

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the customer who wrote the review for reviewer tracking and activity patterns. {@link shopping_mall_customer.id}

plainFields.name: rating
plainFields.description: Star rating from 1 to 5. Whole numbers only representing customer satisfaction level (1=Terrible, 5=Excellent). Used for average rating calculation and product sorting.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Review title between 5 and 100 characters summarizing the review. Appears in review lists and search results. Used for indexing and display.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: Detailed review text between 10 and 2000 characters describing customer experience. Can include product quality feedback, delivery experience, and recommendations. Subject to content moderation before publication.

plainFields.name: review_status
plainFields.description: Current moderation status of the review. Values: DRAFT (initial submission), PENDING_MODERATION (awaiting admin review), APPROVED (published and visible), REJECTED (failed moderation), EDITED (customer modified after approval). Determines visibility to other customers.

plainFields.name: is_verified_purchase
plainFields.description: Whether this review is from a verified purchase verified by matching order delivery. Always true for reviews in this table as unverified reviews are rejected at submission. Used to display 'Verified Purchase' badge to customers.

plainFields.name: helpful_count
plainFields.description: Number of customers who marked this review as helpful via voting system. Used for sorting reviews by helpfulness. Updated when review votes are added/removed.

plainFields.name: unhelpful_count
plainFields.description: Number of customers who marked this review as unhelpful. Used to calculate net helpfulness score. Updated when review votes change.

plainFields.name: moderation_notes
plainFields.description: Internal notes from moderators explaining approval, rejection, or edits made to review content. Visible only to admins. Helps document moderation decisions for compliance.

plainFields.name: rejection_reason
plainFields.description: If rejected, the business reason for rejection (PROFANITY, HATE_SPEECH, SPAM, CONTACT_INFO, OFF_TOPIC, etc.). Shown to customer to explain why review was not published.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when review was first submitted by customer in ISO 8601 format. Immutable after creation. Used to enforce 365-day review window and sort reviews chronologically.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when review was last modified by customer or moderator. Updated when review content is edited or status changes. Helps track review history.

plainFields.name: published_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when review status changed to APPROVED and became visible to customers. Null until approval. Used to track when review became part of product rating.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp if review was removed. Null for active reviews. Used for compliance and audit trails. Allows recovery if needed. Reviews are soft-deleted, not permanently removed.

models.name: shopping_mall_review_ratings
models.description: Aggregated rating statistics for products calculated from individual reviews. Stores pre-calculated average ratings, rating distribution, and review counts. Materialized quasi-view that updates when reviews are approved/rejected. Enables efficient product search sorting and rating display without expensive aggregation queries.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_product_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the product these ratings aggregate. One rating record per product. {@link shopping_mall_products.id}

plainFields.name: average_rating
plainFields.description: Calculated average rating from all approved reviews (1-5 scale with 2 decimal places). Examples: 4.37, 3.82, 5.00. Updated atomically when reviews are approved. Used for product sorting and display.

plainFields.name: total_reviews
plainFields.description: Total count of approved reviews for this product. Used for sorting by popularity and displaying review count to customers (e.g., '506 reviews'). Updated when reviews are approved or rejected.

plainFields.name: five_star_count
plainFields.description: Count of approved 5-star reviews. Part of rating distribution displayed to customers. Updated atomically with review approvals.

plainFields.name: four_star_count
plainFields.description: Count of approved 4-star reviews. Part of rating distribution bar chart.

plainFields.name: three_star_count
plainFields.description: Count of approved 3-star reviews. Part of rating distribution.

plainFields.name: two_star_count
plainFields.description: Count of approved 2-star reviews. Part of rating distribution.

plainFields.name: one_star_count
plainFields.description: Count of approved 1-star reviews. Part of rating distribution.

plainFields.name: rating_percentage_five_star
plainFields.description: Percentage of 5-star reviews (0-100). Calculated as (five_star_count / total_reviews * 100). Rounded to 2 decimal places. Used for display and filtering.

plainFields.name: rating_percentage_four_star
plainFields.description: Percentage of 4-star reviews.

plainFields.name: rating_percentage_three_star
plainFields.description: Percentage of 3-star reviews.

plainFields.name: rating_percentage_two_star
plainFields.description: Percentage of 2-star reviews.

plainFields.name: rating_percentage_one_star
plainFields.description: Percentage of 1-star reviews.

plainFields.name: last_updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when ratings were last recalculated. Updated every time a review is approved or rejected. Used to track freshness of aggregated data.

models.name: shopping_mall_review_moderation
models.description: Tracks the moderation workflow and approval status for reviews. Records which admin reviewed the review, what decision was made, and notes explaining the decision. Provides audit trail for content moderation compliance and enables tracking of moderation queue status.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_review_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the review being moderated. Each review has at most one moderation record. {@link shopping_mall_reviews.id}

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_admin_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the admin who performed the moderation decision. Tracks which moderator approved or rejected. {@link shopping_mall_admin.id}

plainFields.name: moderation_status
plainFields.description: Current status of moderation review. Values: PENDING (awaiting review), APPROVED (content accepted), REJECTED (content failed policy), EDITED (moderator modified content). Determines if review becomes visible.

plainFields.name: decision_reason
plainFields.description: Business reason for the moderation decision. For approvals: 'Content approved' or specific reason. For rejections: PROFANITY, HATE_SPEECH, SPAM, CONTACT_INFO, OFF_TOPIC, PLAGIARISM, UNSUBSTANTIATED_CLAIMS, OTHER.

plainFields.name: moderator_notes
plainFields.description: Detailed internal notes from moderator explaining the decision, any content issues found, or actions taken. Only visible to admins. Used for compliance documentation.

plainFields.name: content_modifications
plainFields.description: If moderator edited review content, describes what changes were made (e.g., 'Removed external URLs', 'Removed phone number'). Null if no modifications made. Used to track content curation.

plainFields.name: auto_flagged
plainFields.description: Whether this review was automatically flagged by spam detection system or manually reported by customer. True if automated system flagged for review.

plainFields.name: flagged_reason
plainFields.description: If auto-flagged, the specific reason from spam filter (PROFANITY_DETECTED, SPAM_PATTERN, CONTACT_INFO_DETECTED, URL_DETECTED, EXCESSIVE_CAPS, etc.). Null if manually reported.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when review was submitted and entered moderation queue. Records when moderation process started.

plainFields.name: moderated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when moderator completed review and made decision. Null until moderation completes. Used to track moderation SLA (should be <24 hours).

plainFields.name: appeal_deadline
plainFields.description: Deadline for customer to appeal rejection decision (typically 14 days from rejection). After this date, rejection cannot be appealed. Null for approved reviews.

models.name: shopping_mall_seller_responses
models.description: Seller responses to customer reviews. Allows sellers to respond professionally to feedback within 30 days of review publication. Responses are publicly visible alongside reviews enabling seller accountability and customer trust building. Sellers can edit their responses anytime after initial submission.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_review_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the review being responded to. Each review can have at most one seller response. {@link shopping_mall_reviews.id}

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the seller providing the response. Sellers can only respond to reviews of their own products. {@link shopping_mall_seller.id}

plainFields.name: response_content
plainFields.description: Seller's response text (maximum 1000 characters). Professional response to customer feedback. Subject to content moderation. Used to show seller accountability and address customer concerns.

plainFields.name: response_status
plainFields.description: Status of seller response. Values: DRAFT (unsaved), PUBLISHED (visible to customers), DELETED (soft deleted by seller). Controls visibility.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when seller first submitted response. Immutable. Used to enforce 30-day response window from review publication.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when seller last edited response. Updated each time response content changes. Shows customers if response was updated after initial submission.

plainFields.name: published_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when response status changed to PUBLISHED. Used to track when response became visible to customers.

models.name: shopping_mall_review_votes
models.description: Tracks whether customers found reviews helpful or unhelpful. Enables review community voting to identify most helpful reviews. One vote record per customer per review. Used to sort reviews by usefulness and calculate helpfulness metrics.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_review_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the review being voted on. {@link shopping_mall_reviews.id}

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the customer casting the vote. Customers can vote only once per review. {@link shopping_mall_customer.id}

plainFields.name: vote_type
plainFields.description: Type of vote cast. Values: HELPFUL (found review useful), UNHELPFUL (did not find useful), or null (vote removed/withdrawn). Determines whether this vote increases helpful or unhelpful counts.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when vote was first cast.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when vote was modified or removed. Used to track vote changes.

models.name: shopping_mall_review_images
models.description: Product images attached to reviews as evidence or proof. Customers can upload 1-3 images per review showing product condition, packaging, or use case. Images are moderated before review publication. Helps other customers evaluate product quality based on real customer photos.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_review_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the review this image belongs to. Multiple images per review allowed (maximum 3). {@link shopping_mall_reviews.id}

plainFields.name: image_url
plainFields.description: URL pointing to the uploaded product image. Images stored in cloud storage (S3, CloudFront, etc.). Used to display photo evidence in review.

plainFields.name: thumbnail_url
plainFields.description: URL pointing to thumbnail version of the image for list view display. Smaller file size for faster loading in review lists.

plainFields.name: image_caption
plainFields.description: Optional customer-provided description of what the image shows (max 200 characters). Examples: 'Product packaging', 'Item quality', 'In use'. Helps other customers understand image context.

plainFields.name: image_order
plainFields.description: Display order of this image in the review (1, 2, or 3). Determines sequence when showing review images to customers. Used for consistent display order.

plainFields.name: image_status
plainFields.description: Moderation status of the image. Values: PENDING (awaiting scan), APPROVED (scanned and safe), REJECTED (policy violation). Images with explicit content are rejected.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when image was uploaded with review.

models.name: shopping_mall_commission_rates
models.description: Stores commission rate configurations for sellers. Tracks both default platform commission rates and custom seller-specific rates with effective dating for rate changes over time. Enables flexible commission management and historical rate tracking for financial reconciliation.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to seller this commission rate applies to. If null, represents default platform commission rate. {@link shopping_mall_seller.id}

plainFields.name: commission_rate
plainFields.description: Commission percentage applied to seller transactions. Valid range 0.0 to 100.0 representing percentage (e.g., 10.0 for 10% commission).

plainFields.name: commission_type
plainFields.description: Type of commission: 'PERCENTAGE' for percentage-based commission or 'FIXED' for fixed amount per transaction. Default is PERCENTAGE.

plainFields.name: effective_from
plainFields.description: Date and time when this commission rate becomes effective. Commission rates can be scheduled for future implementation.

plainFields.name: effective_to
plainFields.description: Date and time when this commission rate ceases to be effective. Null indicates rate is currently active or no end date set.

plainFields.name: reason_for_change
plainFields.description: Explanation for commission rate change (e.g., 'Top seller promotion', 'Performance penalty', 'Seasonal adjustment'). Provides audit trail for rate changes.

plainFields.name: minimum_order_value
plainFields.description: Minimum order subtotal that qualifies for this commission rate. Orders below this value may have different commission treatment.

plainFields.name: maximum_order_value
plainFields.description: Maximum order subtotal subject to this commission rate. Orders exceeding this value may have tiered commission treatment.

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Whether this commission rate is currently active and applicable to new transactions. Inactive rates are historical only.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when commission rate record was created. Used for audit trail and historical tracking.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when commission rate record was last modified. Null indicates no updates after creation.

plainFields.name: created_by
plainFields.description: Admin user ID who created this commission rate. Used for audit trail accountability.

plainFields.name: updated_by
plainFields.description: Admin user ID who last updated this commission rate. Used for audit trail accountability.

models.name: shopping_mall_seller_earnings
models.description: Aggregated earnings and commission tracking per seller. Maintains running totals of seller revenue, platform commissions deducted, and pending payouts. Single record per seller enables efficient earnings dashboard queries and payout processing.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to seller this earnings record belongs to. One-to-one relationship with seller. {@link shopping_mall_seller.id}

plainFields.name: total_gross_sales
plainFields.description: Total gross sales amount (before commission deductions) accumulated over seller's lifetime on platform. Updated whenever order is completed.

plainFields.name: total_commission_deducted
plainFields.description: Total platform commission amount deducted from seller's sales over lifetime. Calculated as sum of all commission charges across all orders.

plainFields.name: total_net_earnings
plainFields.description: Total net earnings for seller (gross sales minus commissions). Represents seller's cumulative profit after platform fees.

plainFields.name: current_month_gross_sales
plainFields.description: Gross sales amount for current calendar month. Reset to zero on first day of each month for monthly reporting.

plainFields.name: current_month_commission
plainFields.description: Commission charged to seller in current calendar month. Reset to zero monthly for tracking monthly commission accumulation.

plainFields.name: current_month_net_earnings
plainFields.description: Net earnings for seller in current calendar month (current_month_gross_sales - current_month_commission).

plainFields.name: pending_commission_amount
plainFields.description: Commission amount that has been calculated but not yet transferred to seller. Amount awaiting payout processing.

plainFields.name: total_paid_out
plainFields.description: Total amount that has been successfully paid out to seller through payouts. Cumulative lifetime payout amount.

plainFields.name: total_orders_completed
plainFields.description: Count of orders successfully completed by seller that resulted in earnings. Used for seller performance metrics.

plainFields.name: total_orders_cancelled
plainFields.description: Count of orders cancelled that affected earnings (refunds issued). Used to track order success rate.

plainFields.name: total_refunds_issued
plainFields.description: Total amount refunded to customers from seller's earnings. Represents earnings that were reversed due to returns.

plainFields.name: commission_rate_applied
plainFields.description: Current active commission rate percentage applied to this seller's transactions. May differ from platform default rate.

plainFields.name: last_payout_date
plainFields.description: Date and time when seller received last payout. Null if seller has never been paid out.

plainFields.name: next_scheduled_payout
plainFields.description: Scheduled date and time for next payout to this seller. Based on payout schedule (typically weekly).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when seller earnings record was created (typically at seller account creation).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when seller earnings were last updated. Updated whenever new order is completed or payout processed.

models.name: shopping_mall_seller_payouts
models.description: Individual payout transactions sent to sellers. Each record represents one payment sent or scheduled to be sent to a seller. Tracks payout status, amount, method, and processing details for complete financial accounting.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to seller receiving this payout. {@link shopping_mall_seller.id}

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_earnings_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to seller's earnings record this payout applies to. {@link shopping_mall_seller_earnings.id}

plainFields.name: payout_reference_id
plainFields.description: Unique identifier for this payout (e.g., PAY-20241016-000123). Used for tracking and reference purposes.

plainFields.name: payout_amount
plainFields.description: Amount being paid to seller in this payout. Net amount after all deductions and adjustments.

plainFields.name: payout_period_start
plainFields.description: Start date of the earning period this payout covers (typically Monday of payout week).

plainFields.name: payout_period_end
plainFields.description: End date of the earning period this payout covers (typically Sunday of payout week).

plainFields.name: orders_included_count
plainFields.description: Number of orders included in this payout calculation. Indicates scope of earnings aggregated.

plainFields.name: total_commission_deducted
plainFields.description: Total commission amount deducted from earnings in this payout period.

plainFields.name: total_adjustments
plainFields.description: Total amount of adjustments (positive or negative) applied to seller earnings in this payout.

plainFields.name: payout_method
plainFields.description: Method of payout: 'BANK_TRANSFER', 'WIRE_TRANSFER', 'DIGITAL_WALLET', 'CHECK'. Indicates how payment will be delivered.

plainFields.name: bank_account_last_four
plainFields.description: Last 4 digits of bank account used for payout (for security display and verification).

plainFields.name: payout_status
plainFields.description: Current status of payout: 'SCHEDULED', 'PROCESSING', 'COMPLETED', 'FAILED', 'REVERSED'. Tracks payout lifecycle.

plainFields.name: scheduled_date
plainFields.description: Date when payout is scheduled to be sent. Payout may be scheduled in advance before actual processing.

plainFields.name: processed_date
plainFields.description: Date and time when payout was actually processed/sent to seller. Null if not yet processed.

plainFields.name: completed_date
plainFields.description: Date when payout was confirmed as received/completed. Null if not yet completed.

plainFields.name: failure_reason
plainFields.description: If payout failed, explanation of failure reason (e.g., 'Invalid bank account', 'Insufficient funds', 'Bank rejected'). Null for successful payouts.

plainFields.name: retry_count
plainFields.description: Number of times failed payout was retried. Tracks retry attempts for failed payments.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when payout record was created (when payout was scheduled).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when payout record was last updated. Updated as payout status changes.

models.name: shopping_mall_payout_history
models.description: Complete historical record of all payout transactions. Provides immutable audit trail of seller payments for reconciliation, compliance, and financial reporting. Each record represents finalized payout state.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to seller who received this payout. {@link shopping_mall_seller.id}

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_payout_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to source payout record this history entry documents. {@link shopping_mall_seller_payouts.id}

plainFields.name: payout_reference_id
plainFields.description: Reference identifier for this payout (copied from payout record for historical tracking).

plainFields.name: payout_amount
plainFields.description: Amount paid in this payout transaction. Historical snapshot of paid amount.

plainFields.name: commission_deducted
plainFields.description: Commission amount deducted from seller earnings in this period.

plainFields.name: payout_period_start
plainFields.description: Start of earning period covered by this payout.

plainFields.name: payout_period_end
plainFields.description: End of earning period covered by this payout.

plainFields.name: orders_included_count
plainFields.description: Number of orders included in this payout's calculation.

plainFields.name: payout_method
plainFields.description: Method used to deliver payment (BANK_TRANSFER, WIRE_TRANSFER, etc.).

plainFields.name: final_status
plainFields.description: Final status of this payout: 'COMPLETED', 'FAILED', or 'REVERSED'. Snapshot of final state.

plainFields.name: processed_date
plainFields.description: Date payout was actually processed/sent.

plainFields.name: completed_date
plainFields.description: Date payout was confirmed as completed. Null if failed.

plainFields.name: failure_reason
plainFields.description: If payout failed, the reason for failure. Null for successful payouts.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this history record was created (snapshot capture time).

plainFields.name: notes
plainFields.description: Additional notes or details about this payout for audit/reference purposes.

models.name: shopping_mall_commission_calculations
models.description: Line-item commission records for individual orders. Each record represents commission calculation for one order from one seller. Provides detailed audit trail of how each commission amount was derived, enabling financial reconciliation and dispute resolution.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to seller whose commission is being calculated. {@link shopping_mall_seller.id}

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_order_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to order that generated this commission. {@link shopping_mall_orders.id}

plainFields.name: order_subtotal
plainFields.description: Order subtotal amount (sum of item prices before tax/shipping) used as basis for commission calculation.

plainFields.name: commission_rate_applied
plainFields.description: Commission rate percentage applied to this order (e.g., 10.0 for 10%). Rate may vary based on seller status at time of order.

plainFields.name: commission_amount
plainFields.description: Calculated commission amount (order_subtotal  commission_rate_applied  100). Amount deducted from seller's earnings.

plainFields.name: deductions
plainFields.description: Any additional deductions from commission (e.g., refunds, chargebacks, adjustments). Reduces seller's net amount.

plainFields.name: net_commission
plainFields.description: Final commission amount after deductions (commission_amount - deductions). Amount credited to seller.

plainFields.name: order_date
plainFields.description: Date and time when order was placed. Used for period tracking and payout grouping.

plainFields.name: order_status
plainFields.description: Order status when commission was calculated (e.g., 'DELIVERED', 'COMPLETED'). Only calculates commission for delivered/completed orders.

plainFields.name: is_refunded
plainFields.description: Whether order was refunded. If true, commission may be reversed or adjusted.

plainFields.name: refund_amount
plainFields.description: If refunded, the amount refunded to customer. Used to calculate commission reversal.

plainFields.name: commission_status
plainFields.description: Status of commission: 'PENDING' (awaiting payout), 'PAID' (included in payout), 'REVERSED' (refunded), 'ADJUSTED' (modified).

plainFields.name: payout_id
plainFields.description: ID of payout that included this commission (if paid). Null if commission is still pending.

plainFields.name: calculation_notes
plainFields.description: Additional notes about commission calculation (e.g., 'Applied top seller rate', 'Partial refund applied'). Audit trail purposes.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when commission was calculated (typically when order transitioned to completed/delivered status).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when commission record was last updated (if commission was adjusted or refund applied).

models.name: shopping_mall_commission_adjustments
models.description: Manual adjustments to seller commissions for corrections, penalties, bonuses, or special circumstances. Maintains complete audit trail of all commission modifications with justification and approver information. Enables transparent seller financial management and dispute resolution.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to seller whose commission is being adjusted. {@link shopping_mall_seller.id}

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_commission_calculation_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to specific commission calculation being adjusted. Null if adjustment is to overall seller account. {@link shopping_mall_commission_calculations.id}

plainFields.name: adjustment_type
plainFields.description: Type of adjustment: 'BONUS' (positive addition), 'PENALTY' (negative deduction), 'CORRECTION' (error fix), 'REVERSAL' (undo previous), 'REFUND_ADJUSTMENT' (refund-related).

plainFields.name: adjustment_amount
plainFields.description: Amount of adjustment (positive or negative). Positive for bonuses/credits, negative for penalties/deductions.

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Detailed explanation of why adjustment was made. Required for audit trail and seller transparency. Examples: 'Correcting double-commission error', 'Performance bonus for top seller', 'Penalty for policy violation'.

plainFields.name: adjustment_status
plainFields.description: Status of adjustment: 'PENDING' (awaiting approval), 'APPROVED' (authorized), 'REJECTED' (denied), 'APPLIED' (included in payout). Workflow status tracking.

plainFields.name: created_by_admin_id
plainFields.description: Admin user ID who created/requested this adjustment. Audit trail for who initiated the change.

plainFields.name: approved_by_admin_id
plainFields.description: Admin user ID who approved this adjustment. Null if pending or rejected. Two-level approval for financial changes.

plainFields.name: requested_date
plainFields.description: Timestamp when adjustment was requested/created. Tracks when change was initiated.

plainFields.name: approved_date
plainFields.description: Timestamp when adjustment was approved. Null if not yet approved.

plainFields.name: applied_date
plainFields.description: Timestamp when adjustment was actually applied to seller earnings. Null if not yet applied.

plainFields.name: rejection_reason
plainFields.description: If adjustment was rejected, explanation of why. Null for approved adjustments.

plainFields.name: supporting_documents
plainFields.description: References to supporting documentation (file IDs, URLs) justifying the adjustment. Used for complex adjustments requiring evidence.

plainFields.name: related_order_id
plainFields.description: If adjustment relates to specific order, the order ID. Helps track which order triggered the adjustment.

plainFields.name: notes
plainFields.description: Additional internal notes about adjustment for admin reference. May include investigation details or follow-up required.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when adjustment record was created in system.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when adjustment record was last modified (status change, approval, rejection).
